players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I'm still gathering information. No rush for me to speak."
Charlie: "I'm the Mafioso and I killed Diana last night. Keep an eye on Bob, as he seems suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
